6BinaryAirdrop_desc: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat. Gain 1 random item components.
6GachaAddict_desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 50% chance to gain a free refresh.
6HyperRoll_desc: You earn no interest, but gain 3 gold at the start of every player combat round.
6MaxLevel10_desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 3. Gain 2 immediately. You can now reach level 10.
6MetabolicAccelerator_desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PvP round.
6OneTwoFive_desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random Tier 5 champion(s).
6PandorasItems_desc: Gain 1 random item component(s). Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).
6PortableForge_desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 2 unique Artifacts.
6PortableForgePlus_desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts.
6PortableForgePlusPlus_desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 4 unique Artifacts.
6RadiantRelics_desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 5 unique Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.
6Recombobulator_desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 Tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.
6RichGetRicher_desc: Gain 12 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.
6RichGetRicherPlus_desc: Gain 18 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.
6SalvageBin_desc: Gain a random completed item now, and a component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
6SlowAndSteady_desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.
6TheGoldenEgg_desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. Victorious player combats accelerate the hatch timer by an additional turn.
6TinyTitans_desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and gains 30 maximum health.
6TomeOfTraits1_desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 3 gold.
6TradeSector_desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 2 gold.
6Traitless2_desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 200-425 Health and 40-60% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).
6Traitless3_desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-550 Health and 45-65% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).
6Twins2_desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 33% Attack Damage and 33 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.
6Twins3_desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 44% Attack Damage and 44 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.
7AFK_desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.
7BirthdayPresents_desc: Gain 2 gold and a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).
7Consistency_desc: Gain double win and loss streak gold.
7CursedCrown_desc: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.
7LastStand_desc: The first time you would be eliminated or reduced to 1 Health, instead remain alive. After this effect triggers, your units permanently gain 180 Health, 18 Armor and Magic Resist, and 18% Omnivamp.
7LategameSpecialist_desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 44 gold.
7LivingForge_desc: Gain an Artifact Anvil now and after every 10 player combats.
7LuckyGloves_desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.
7LuckyGlovesPlus_desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.
7PandorasBench_desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.
7SacrificialPact_desc: Buying XP costs 5 Health instead of gold. Heal 2 Health before each player combat.
7ScopedWeapons1_desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 15% Attack Speed.
7ThinkFast_desc: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 3 gold.
7TomeOfTraits2_desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 5 gold.
8SalvageBinPlus_desc: Gain a random completed item now, and a component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
9ACutAbove_desc: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding Deathblade have a 25% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.
9AirspeedVelocity1_desc: Your units without items equipped gain 30% Attack Speed.
9AirspeedVelocity2_desc: Your units without items equipped gain 55% Attack Speed.
9AllNatural_desc: Your champions with no items equipped gain 120 Health and heal for 1% of their max Health each second.
9AllNatural2_desc: Your champions with no items equipped gain 150 Health and heal for 2% of their max Health each second.
9AllThatShimmers_desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 Shimmerscale items. Shimmerscale items aid gold generation.
9ArmorcladEmblem_desc: Gain an Juggernaut Emblem and a Sett.
9ArmorcladEmblem2_desc: Gain an Juggernaut Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Darius.
9ArmorcladTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Juggernaut. Gain a Sett.
9ArmyBuilding_desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. This happens a second time after 7 player combats.
9BardPlaybook1_desc: Each time you level up, gain the same random Tier 2 champion.
9BardPlaybook2_desc: Gain a Component Anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.
9BardPlaybook3_desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4 - Component Anvil
Level 6 - Completed Item Anvil
Level 7 - Open a Radiant Item armory
9BastionEmblem_desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem and a Kassadin.
9BastionEmblem2_desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem,  a Sunfire Cape, and a Taric.
9BastionMorningLight_desc: When your Bastion units drop below 50% Health, they heal for 40% of their maximum Health over 4 seconds. Gain 2 Bastion units.
9BastionTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bastion. Gain a Kassadin.
9BilgewaterEmblem_desc: Gain a Bilgewater Emblem and a Twisted Fate.
9BilgewaterEmblem2_desc: Gain a Bilgewater Emblem, a Night Harvester, and a Nautilus.
9BilgewaterRisingInfamy_desc: Round start: Get a level 1 treasure chest. Your cannon barrages permanently improve future chests. Gain 3 Bilgerats.
9BilgewaterRisingInfamy2_desc: Round start: Get a level 2 treasure chest. Your cannon barrages permanently improve future chests. Gain 3 Bilgerats.
9BilgewaterRisingInfamy3_desc: Round start: Get a level 3 treasure chest. Your cannon barrages permanently improve future chests. Gain 3 Bilgerats.
9BlindingSpeed_desc: Gain a Rapid Firecannon, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow, and a Magnetic Remover.
9BloodMoney_desc: Gain 1 gold per 3 Health your Tactician loses.
9BranchingOut_desc: Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.
9BronzeTicket_desc: Every 4 shop refreshes, gain a free refresh.
9BruiserEmblem_desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Vi.
9BruiserEmblem2_desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Redemption, and a Rek'Sai.
9BruiserTitanicStrength_desc: Bruisers gain increased Attack Damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health. Gain 2 Bruisers.
9BruiserTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser. Gain a Vi.
9BuildingACollection_desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 2 rounds (including this round).
9BuildingACollectionPlus_desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 3 rounds (including this round).
9BuildingACollectionPlusPlus_desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).
9CapriciousForge_desc: Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two temporary Artifacts each round.
9ChallengerDefensiveDash_desc: Combat start and on takedown: Your Challenger units gain 75-225 Shield (based on current Stage) for 2.5 seconds. Gain 2 Challenger units.
9ChallengerEmblem_desc: Gain a Challenger Emblem and a Warwick.
9ChallengerEmblem2_desc: Gain a Challenger Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Naafiri.
9ChallengerTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Challenger. Gain a Warwick.
9CombatCaster_desc: Your units gain 90-170 Shield (based on current Stage) for 6 seconds after casting their ability.
9Contagion_desc: Combat start: Infect the highest Health enemy, causing them to take 18% more damage. Every 5 seconds or on death, the infection spreads to 2 nearby enemies.
9CustomerIsAlwaysRight_desc: Whenever you would get a random component, instead gain a Component Anvil. Gain a random component.
9CuttingCorners_desc: Leveling up costs 3 XP less. You can now reach Level 10.
9CyberneticBulk1_desc: Your champions holding an item gain 225 Health.
9CyberneticBulk2_desc: Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.
9CyberneticBulk3_desc: Your champions holding an item gain 500 health.
9CyberneticLeech1_desc: Your units holding an item gain 80 Health and 10% Omnivamp.
9CyberneticLeech2_desc: Your units holding an item gain 120 Health and 15% Omnivamp.
9CyberneticLeech3_desc: Your units holding an item gain 225 Health and 20% Omnivamp.
9DangerousToGoAlone_desc: When a unit dies, they pass a temporary copy of one of their items to the nearest ally with open slots and shield them for 40% of their maximum Health.
9Dedication_desc: The first time you field at least 4 distinct units of the same trait in player combat, gain an Emblem for that trait.
9DemaciaEmblem_desc: Gain a Demacia Emblem and a Galio.
9DemaciaEmblem2_desc: Gain a Demacia Emblem, a Recurve Bow, and a Quinn.
9DemaciaPetriciteShackles_desc: Your Demacians deal 15% more damage, increased to 22% against Noxians and enemies with 100 or more maximum Mana. Gain 3 Demacians.
9DemaciaTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Demacia. Gain a Galio.
9DravenSpoilsOfWar_desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 25% chance to drop loot.
9DravenSpoilsOfWar2_desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 30% chance to drop loot.
9DravenSpoilsOfWar3_desc: When you kill an enemy unit, there's a 40% chance to drop loot.
9EarlyEducation_desc: Your units permanently gain 1 Ability Power whenever they kill an enemy. Units start with 15 bonus Ability Power.
9EnduranceTraining_desc: Your units permanently gain 18 Health every time they kill an enemy. Units start with 100 bonus Health.
9EnshroudingStillness_desc: Gain a Shroud of Stillness. All enemies take 1.5% of their maximum Health as true damage each second until the first time they cast their Ability.
9EscortQuest_desc: Gain a Training Dummy. Each round, if it survives combat, gain 3 gold.
9FinalReserves_desc: The first time you would be eliminated or reduced to 1 Health, instead remain alive. Then, at the beginning of your next planning phase gain 60 XP and set your gold to 66. Excess gold is converted to XP.
9Formation1_desc: If you have 3 or more units in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.
9Formation2_desc: If you have 3 or more units in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.
9FreljordGlacialBreeze_desc: When your Freljordian Storm strikes, your units are shielded for 15% of their maximum Health and gain 8% Attack Speed. Gain 2 Freljord units.
9FreljordTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Freljord. Gain an Ashe.
9FreljordTrait2_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Freljord. Gain a Redemption and an Ashe.
9GalioCarry_desc: Gain a Galio. Your strongest Galio's ability gets larger with each cast, and enemies hit take magic damage equal to 12% of his max Health each second.
9GargantuanResolve_desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 40 instead of 25.
9GiftsFromAbove_desc: Combat start: Distribute 4 temporary items to the champions with the fewest items.
9GiftsFromTheFallen_desc: Your units gain 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, and 4 Magic Resist. Each time an allied unit dies, gain these stats again.
9GreaterJeweledLotus_desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 45% Critical Strike chance.
9GunnerSpiritOfTheDuelist_desc: Your Gunner units gain 8% Attack Speed, plus 2% per Gunner stack. Gain 2 Gunners.
9Harmacist1_desc: Your units heal for 10% of the damage they deal, and they convert 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.
9Harmacist2_desc: Your units heal for 15% of the damage they deal, and they convert 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.
9Harmacist3_desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage they deal, and they convert 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.
9HealingOrbsI_desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest allied unit is healed for 250.
9HealingOrbsII_desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest allied unit is healed for 500.
9HedgeFund_desc: Gain 23 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 10.
9HedgeFundPlus_desc: Gain 32 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 10.
9HedgeFundPlusPlus_desc: Gain 44 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 10.
9HighEndSector_desc: Gain 1 gold per round. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds.
9Idealism_desc: Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions holding Hand of Justice deal 12% increased damage.
9ImpenetrableBulwark_desc: Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.
9ImpromptuInventions_desc: At the start of combat, up to 5 components on your champions turn into completed items for the rest of combat. At the start of the next 2 stage(s), gain a component.
9Inconsistency_desc: If your streak is less than 3, gain 2 gold.
9IndomitableWill_desc: When your units score a takedown they shed all negative effects and become immune to crowd control for 10 seconds.
9InfernalContract_desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 75 gold.
9Infusion_desc: Your units restore 20 Mana every 6 seconds.
9InvokerLovingInvocation_desc: Your team gains 2 Ability Power until the end of combat each time your Invokers cast their Abilities. Gain 2 Invokers.
9IoniaEmblem_desc: Gain a Ionia Emblem and a Sett.
9IoniaEmblem2_desc: Gain an Ionia Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Karma.
9IoniaSentinelsSpirit_desc: While in spirit form, your Ionians gain 10% Attack Speed and shield themselves for 15% of their maximum Health. Gain 2 Ionians.
9IoniaTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ionia. Gain a Sett.
9IronAssets_desc: Gain a Component Anvil and 4 gold.
9IxtalRejuvenatingFlames_desc: Allies heal for 8% of their max Health every 5 seconds. Allies that started combat in an elemental hex heal for 15% instead. Gain 2 Ixtal champions.
9IxtalTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ixtal. Gain a Qiyana.
9IxtalTrait2_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ixtal. Gain a Crownguard and a Neeko.
9Jackpot_desc: After you refresh your shop 40 times, gain a copy of each Tier 5 unit.
9JeweledLotus_desc: Your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 15% Critical Strike chance.
9JuggernautCantStopMe_desc: Your Juggernauts deal 10% more damage, increased to 20% for the rest of combat when they fall below 50% Health.  Gain 2 Juggernauts.
9JustKeepRolling_desc: After you refresh your shop 8 times, your refreshes cost 1 for the rest of the game.
9KassadinCarry_desc: Gain a Kassadin. Before casting, your strongest Kassadin gains 35 Ability Power and blinks to the furthest enemy within 3 hexes, but his ability no longer disarms or shields. His Mana cost is reduced by 30.
9KnowledgeIsPower_desc: Gain a Tome of Traits and a Component Anvil.
9KnowYourEnemy_desc: Your units deal 12% increased damage. If you and your opponent have any of the same traits activated, they deal 18% increased damage instead.
9LearningFromExperience2_desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost. You can now reach Level 10.
9LesserJeweledLotus_desc: Combat start: Your strongest unit gains 40% Critical Strike Chance and their abilities can critically strike.
9LongDistanceRelationship1_desc: Combat start: Your two furthest units form a bond, sharing 20% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.
9LongDistanceRelationship2_desc: Combat start: Your two furthest units form a bond, sharing 25% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.
9LongTimeCrafting_desc: Gain an Artifact Anvil after 8 player combats.
9MarksmanEmblem_desc: Gain a Gunner Emblem and a Jinx.
9MarksmanEmblem2_desc: Gain a Gunner Emblem, a Runaan's Hurricane, and a Jayce.
9MarksmanTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Gunner. Gain a Jinx.
9Martyr_desc: Whenever one of your units dies, all allies heal for 10% of their maximum Health.
9MissedConnections_desc: Gain a copy of each Tier 1 champion.
9MoneyHealsAllWounds_desc: Round start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, your Tactician heals 2 Health.
9MulticasterPracticeMakesPerfect_desc: Each time your Multicasters cast their Ability, they gain 6 Ability power (max: 90) until the end of combat. Gain 2 Multicasters.
9MulticasterTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Multicaster. Gain a Taliyah.
9MulticasterTrait2_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Multicaster. Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet and a Vel'Koz.
9NotToday_desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding Edge of Night gain 35% Attack Speed.
9NoxusEmblem_desc: Gain a Noxus Emblem and a Swain.
9NoxusEmblem2_desc: Gain a Noxus Emblem, a Sparring Gloves, and a Darius.
9NoxusTotalDomination_desc: Noxus units' attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 3% Health, increased by 1% for each player you've Conquered. Gain 2 Noxians.
9NoxusTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Noxus. Gain a Swain.
9OldMansWalkingStick_desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.
9OnARoll_desc: Whenever you star up a champion, gain a free shop refresh, up to 2 time(s) per turn. Gain 2 Gold.
9OneHundredDuckSizedHorses_desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.
9OneHundredDuckSizedHorsesPlus_desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 12 gold.
9OneTwosThree_desc: Gain 1 Tier one unit, 2 Tier two units, and 1 Tier three unit.
9OverwhelmingForce_desc: Gain a Deathblade and an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.
9PandorasItems2_desc: Gain 1 random completed item(s). Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).
9PandorasRadiantBox_desc: Gain a random Radiant item. Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).
9PhreakyFriday_desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.
9PhreakyFridayPlus_desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.
9PiltoverShimmeringInventors_desc: Your Piltover units deal 7% more damage for every 10 gold you have (max: 35%), and have a 33% chance to drop 1 gold at round start. Gain an Ekko.
9PiltoverTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Piltover. Gain a Vi.
9PiltoverTrait2_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Piltover. Gain a Giant Slayer and a Jayce.
9PreserverEmblem_desc: Gain an Invoker Emblem and a Soraka.
9PreserverEmblem2_desc: Gain a Invoker Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Karma.
9PreserverTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Invoker. Gain a Soraka.
9PumpingUp_desc: Your units gain 8% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 0.5%.
9PumpingUp2_desc: Your units gain 8% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 1%.
9PumpingUp3_desc: Your units gain 12% Attack Speed. Each round, increase this by 2%.
9RedBuff_desc: Your units' attacks burn their targets for 5% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds and reduce their targets' healing received by 50%.
9ReturnOnInvestment_desc: After you refresh your shop 18 times, gain a Tactician's Crown
9RiskyMoves_desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.
9RogueEmblem_desc: Gain a Rogue Emblem and a Qiyana.
9RogueEmblem2_desc: Gain a Rogue Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Katarina.
9RogueTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Rogue. Gain a Qiyana.
9RogueVampiricBlades_desc: Your units gain 10% Omnivamp. Your Rogues gain 20% instead. Gain 2 Rogues.
9RollTheDice_desc: Gain a Rascal's Gloves, which equips two random Radiant items every round.
9SettTheBoss_desc: Gain a Sett. The first time your strongest Sett falls below 60% Health, he takes a break to do sit-ups. Each sit-up heals him 10% of his max Health and grants 40% Attack Speed and 40 Ability Power.
9Shoplifting_desc: At the start of each turn, gain the highest Tier champion in your shop for free.
9ShurimaEmblem_desc: Gain a Shurima Emblem and a Taliyah.
9ShurimaEmblem2_desc: Gain a Shurima Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Naafiri.
9ShurimaShurimasLegacy_desc: After 8 seconds of combat, the Sun Disc attacks enemies for 145-725 magic damage every 2 seconds (based on current Stage). Gain 2 Shurimans.
9ShurimaTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shurima. Gain a Taliyah.
9SilverTicket_desc: Each time your shop is refreshed, you have a 30% chance to gain a free refresh.
9SlayerEmblem_desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem and a Qiyana.
9SlayerEmblem2_desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem, a Night Harvester, and a Quinn.
9SlayerSlayersResolve_desc: When your Slayers take or deal damage, they gain 2 stacking Armor and Magic Resistance for the rest of combat (max: 25 stacks). Gain 2 Slayers.
9SlayerTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Slayer. Gain a Qiyana.
9Sleightofhand_desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding Thief's Gloves gain 200 Health and 20% Attack Speed.
9SocialDistancing_desc: Combat start: Units with no adjacent allies gain 10% Attack Damage and 10 Ability Power.
9SocialDistancing2_desc: Combat start: Units with no adjacent allies gain 16% Attack Damage and 16 Ability Power.
9SocialDistancing3_desc: Combat start: Units with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Damage and 25 Ability Power.
9SorcererEmblem_desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem and a Swain.
9SorcererEmblem2_desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Vel'Koz.
9SorcererOverchargedManafont_desc: Combat start: Your Sorcerers gain 10 mana. The first time each Sorcerer gets a takedown each combat, they gain 20 Mana. Gain 2 Sorcerers.
9SorcererTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sorcerer. Gain a Swain.
9StarsAreBorn_desc: The first Tier 1 champion and Tier 2 champion you buy are upgraded to 2-star. Gain 6 gold.
9StarterKit_desc: Gain a Tier 4 champion and a 2-star Tier 1 champion that shares a trait with them. At the next 2 stages, gain the Tier 4 champion again.
9StationarySupport1_desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy(s). In 8 player combats, equip the dummy(s) with 1 random Support Item(s), which cannot be removed.
9StationarySupport2_desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy(s). They have 1 random Support Item(s) equipped, which cannot be removed.
9StationarySupport3_desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy(s). They have 2 random Support Item(s) equipped, which cannot be removed.
9StrategistTacticalSuperiority_desc: Your champions gain 4% Attack Damage and Ability Power for each of their active traits, doubled when you field a Strategist. Gain 2 Strategists.
9StrategistTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Strategist. Gain a Swain.
9StrategistTrait2_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Strategist. Gain an Adaptive Helm and a Swain.
9SupportCache_desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 4 unique Support items.
9SwainCarry_desc: Gain a Swain. Your strongest Swain deals 3% increased damage per 100 max Health.
9TargonStaffOfFlowingWaters_desc: While you have the Targon trait activated, your units gain 35% Attack Speed for 4 seconds after being healed or shielded. Gain 2 Targonians.
9TargonTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Targon. Gain a Soraka.
9TargonTrait2_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Targon. Gain a Redemption and a Taric.
9ThreesACrowd_desc: Your units gain 100 Health for each unique Tier 3 unit you field.
9TiniestTitan_desc: Your tactician is small and speedy, heals 2 Health after a PVP round, and grants 2 gold per round.
9TiniestTitanPlus_desc: Your tactician is small and speedy, heals 2 Health after a PVP round, and grants 2 gold per round. Gain 8 gold now.
9TonsOfStats_desc: Your team gains 35 Health, 5% Attack Damage, 5 Ability Power, 5 Armor, 5 Magic Resist, 5% Attack Speed, and 5 Mana.
9Transfusion_desc: Your units gain 20 Health, plus 2 Health per missing Tactician Health.
9TransfusionPlus_desc: Your units gain 40 Health, plus 3 Health per missing Tactician Health.
9TransfusionPlusPlus_desc: Your units gain 50 Health, plus 5 Health per missing Tactician Health.
9TwoHealthy_desc: Your units gain 100 Health for each unique Tier 2 unit you field.
9UnleashedArcana_desc: Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.
9VanquisherEmblem_desc: Gain a Vanquisher Emblem and an Ashe.
9VanquisherEmblem2_desc: Gain a Vanquisher Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Darius.
9VanquisherStolenVitality_desc: When your Vanquisher's attacks and Abilities critically strike, they heal the ally with the most missing Health by 1.3% of that ally's max Health. Gain 2 Vanquishers.
9VanquisherTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Vanquisher. Gain an Ashe.
9VoidEmblem_desc: Gain a Void Emblem and a Kassadin.
9VoidEmblem2_desc: Gain a Void Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and a Rek'Sai.
9VoidRapidIncubation_desc: Your Void units gain 60 Health and 6% Attack Damage and Ability Power for each star level they have. Gain 2 Void units.
9VoidTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Void. Gain a Kassadin.
9VoidTrait2_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Void. Gain a Zz'Rot Portal and a Rek'Sai.
9WanderingTrainer_desc: Gain a Training Dummy. It has 3 random Emblems equipped, which cannot be removed. Gain 4 gold.
9WarwickCarry_desc: Gain a Warwick. When your strongest Warwick takes or deals damage, he gains 4% Attack Damage and 4 Ability Power, stacking up to 55 times. His passive healing is replaced with magic damage on his attacks.
9WhatDoesntKillYou_desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold. Every 4 losses, gain a random component.
9WhatTheForge_desc: All completed items you own or receive are transformed into random Artifacts (excluding Tactician's Crown and Emblems). Units gain 110 Health per equipped Artifact.
9YordleUnstableYordlePortal_desc: Round start: Gain a random Yordle or 1-5 gold (based on current Stage). Gain 3 Yordles now.
9YouHaveMyBow_desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.
9YouHaveMySword_desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.
9YoungAndWildAndFree_desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 1 random item component(s).
9ZaunChemicallyEnhancedBulk_desc: Your units with Zaun's chem-mods gain 500 Health. Allies that start combat adjacent to them gain 250 Health. Gain 2 Zaun units.
9ZaunEmblem_desc: Gain a Zaun Emblem and a Warwick.
9ZaunEmblem2_desc: Gain a Zaun Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and an Ekko.
9ZaunTrait_desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Zaun. Gain a Warwick.
9Commander_MediumForgePlus_desc: Gain a Completed Item Anvil and 1 random component.
9Commander_TeamingUp2_desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 1 random Tier 4 champion.
9Commander_TeamingUp3_desc: Gain 1 Support Anvil, 1 random component, and 2 random Tier 4 champions.
9Commander_TeamingUp1_desc: Gain 1 random component and @numunits@ random Tier 3 champions.
9GottaGoFastIII_desc: Your units generate 30% more Mana and move 100% faster.
9Commander_SmallForgePlus_desc: Gain 1 Component Anvil and 1 random component.
9Commander_Money_desc: Gain 11 gold. In 4 turns, gain 11 gold again.
9Commander_WellEarnedComforts_desc: Your units gain 80 Health for each item equipped.
9Commander_SmallForge_desc: Gain a Component Anvil and 2 gold.
9Commander_PartialAscension_desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.
9Commander_LargeForgePlus_desc: Gain an Artifact Anvil and a Completed Item Anvil.
9Commander_LargeForge_desc: Gain an Artifact Anvil and a Component Item Anvil.
9Commander_RollingForDays_desc: Gain 10 free shop refreshes. These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.
9FinalGrabBag_desc: Gain a random component, 10 gold, and a Reforger.
9BigGrabBag_desc: Gain 2 random components, 1 gold, and a Reforger.
9TinyGrabBag_desc: Gain a random component, 2 gold, a Magnetic Remover.
9FinalGrabBagPlusPlus_desc: Gain 2 random components, a Champion Duplicator, and a Spatula.
9BattleReadyIII_desc: Your team deals 8% more damage and takes 8% less damage.
9FinalGrabBagPlus_desc: Gain 2 random components, 12 gold, and a Magnetic Remover.
9Commander_FinalAscension_desc: Your units deal 15% more damage. After 15 seconds, this effect triples.
9GottaGoFast_desc: Your units generate 10% more Mana and move 35% faster.
9ItemGrabBagPlus_desc: Gain a random completed item, a random component, and 1 gold.
9TopDeck_desc: Gain 5 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.
9TopDeckPlus_desc: Gain 12 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.
9Commander_RollingForDays3_desc: Gain 25 free shop refreshes. These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.
9Commander_RollingForDays2_desc: Gain 15 free shop refreshes. These shop refreshes carry over between rounds.
9Commander_Ascension_desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.
9BattleReadyII_desc: Your team deals 6% more damage and takes 6% less damage.
9Commander_TinyPower3_desc: Your units gain 15% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.
9Commander_TinyPower2_desc: Your units gain 10% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.
9Commander_TinyPower1_desc: Your units gain 6% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.
9GiantGrabBag_desc: Gain 3 random components, 4 gold, and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.
9BalancedBudget_desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 4 gold.
9TopDeckPlusPlus_desc: Gain 24 gold and a Champion Duplicator.
9Commander_MediumForge_desc: Gain a Completed Item Anvil and 1 Gold.
9BattleReady_desc: Your team deals 3% more damage and takes 3% less damage.
9ItemGrabBagPlusPlus_desc: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Gold.
9Commander_Money2_desc: Gain 16 gold. In 4 turns, gain 16 gold again.
9Commander_Money3_desc: Gain 25 gold. In 4 turns, gain 25 gold again.
9BalancedBudget2_desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 6 gold.
9BalancedBudget3_desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 11 gold.
9Commander_WellEarnedComforts2_desc: Your units gain 111 Health for each item equipped.
9Commander_WellEarnedComforts3_desc: Your units gain 120 Health and 6% Attack Speed for each item equipped.
9GottaGoFastII_desc: Your units generate 20% more Mana and move 60% faster.
Legend_Augment_desc: Placeholder for tailored silver legend augment picked during 2-1. If you pick a legend's tailored augment, it's data is missing from the Riot API. This is a placeholder to represent that and it could be from any of the legends.
Legend_Augment2_desc: Placeholder for tailored gold legend augment picked during 2-1. If you pick a legend's tailored augment, it's data is missing from the Riot API. This is a placeholder to represent that and it could be from any of the legends.
Legend_Augment3_desc: Placeholder for tailored prismatic legend augment picked during 2-1. If you pick a legend's tailored augment, it's data is missing from the Riot API. This is a placeholder to represent that and it could be from any of the legends.
